name: European Documentary Network
goal:
EDN - Stimulating networks & knowledge within the documentary sector

EDN - European Documentary Network is a global network for professionals working with documentary film and TV. Close to 1000 members from more than 60 countries have joined EDN. Our organisation is open for both newcomers and established filmmakers from around the world.
euInitiatives:
The Single Digital Market

Copyright Legislations

The Creative Europe Media Programme
